mapper.select: select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from FUNDING order by FUNDING_WDATE desc limit 0, 4) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 4
select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from FUNDING order by FUNDING_AMOUNT desc limit 0, 5) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 5
select FUNDING_CATEGORY_NAME from FUNDING_CATEGORY where FUNDING_CATEGORY_CODE=${category_code}
select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from CREATOR order by CREATOR_NAME desc limit 0, 3) aa, (SELECT @RUWNUM := 0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 3
select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from GOODS order by GOODS_REVIEW_NUMBER desc limit 0, 4) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) TMP) bb where rnum <= 4
select * from CREATOR where CREATOR_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{creator_name},'%')

select * from (select @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 as rnum, aa.* from (select * from FUNDING where FUNDING_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or CREATOR_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by FUNDING_WDATE desc limit ${(funding_cp-1)*funding_ps}, ${funding_cp*funding_ps}) aa, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=${(funding_cp-1)*funding_ps}) TMP) bb where rnum>${(funding_cp-1)*funding_ps} and rnum<=${funding_cp*funding_ps}
select COUNT(FUNDING_INDEX) from FUNDING where FUNDING_SUBJECT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or CREATOR_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into CONTACT values((select nextval('CONTACT_INDEX_SEQ')), #{contact_name}, #{contact_email}, #{contact_subject}, #{contact_message}, null)
